reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 581/05: DELEGATION OF REGULATION-MAKING AUTHORITY TO THE BOARD OF THE ADMINISTRATIVE AUTHORITY
reg_info.reg_name_text: delegation of regulation-making authority to the BOARD OF THE administrative authority
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 581/05: DELEGATION OF REGULATION-MAKING AUTHORITY TO THE BOARD OF THE ADMINISTRATIVE AUTHORITY
reg_info.act_under: Trust in Real Estate Services Act, 2002

content.content: 1. (1) Subject to subsections (2) and (3), the power to make regulations under subsection 50 (1) of the Act is delegated to the board of the administrative authority.  O. Reg. 581/05, s. 1 (1). (2) The authority to make regulations under paragraph 20 of subsection 51 (1) of the Act that require information required under the Act to be in a form approved by the Minister is not delegated to the board of the administrative authority.  O. Reg. 581/05, s. 1 (2). (3) A regulation made by the board of the administrative authority pursuant to subsection (1) is subject to the approval of the Minister.  O. Reg. 581/05, s. 1 (3).
content.raw_html:
1. (1) Subject to subsections (2) and (3), the power to make regulations under subsection 50 (1) of the Act is delegated to the board of the administrative authority.  O. Reg. 581/05, s. 1 (1).

(2) The authority to make regulations under paragraph 20 of subsection 51 (1) of the Act that require information required under the Act to be in a form approved by the Minister is not delegated to the board of the administrative authority.  O. Reg. 581/05, s. 1 (2).

(3) A regulation made by the board of the administrative authority pursuant to subsection (1) is subject to the approval of the Minister.  O. Reg. 581/05, s. 1 (3).

content.content: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).  O. Reg. 581/05, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).  O. Reg. 581/05, s. 2.
